extensionDescription.message: Add universal custom player with the ability to download.

search_links_in_all_page_texts.message: Search links in all page texts

PLAYER_MAIN.message: (Player Playback part) (do not translate this line)

not_in_the_buffered_range_0br0_Try_anoth.message: Not in the buffered range,$br$ Try another timecode

PLAYER_SIZES.message: (Player changable sizes part) (do not translate this line)

resize_player_to_browser_s_window_sizes.message: Resize player to browser's window sizes

_HEADER.message: (header of service extension page) (do not translate this line)

DOWNLOAD.message: (service extension page) (do not translate this line)

OPTIONS.message: (service extension page) (left menu) (do not translate this line)

changes_saved_but_for_apply_changes_tabs.message: Changes saved! But for apply changes, tabs with activated Player menu need to be reload. Reload them automatically?

OPTIONS.message: (service extension page) (content part) (do not translate this line)

player_automatically_loads_into_the_relo.message: player automatically loads into the reloaded tabs, in which it was previously included, until the tab or browser won't be closed

player_automatically_loads_into_the_tabs.message: player automatically loads into the tabs, which have been opened by tabs, in which player was previously included, until the tab or browser won't be closed. It works for the tabs, opened only in a same window

note_too_many_formats_can_affect_perform.message: Note: too many formats can affect performance

when_pressing_the_scan_also_texts_button.message: when pressing the 'Scan also Texts' button in the 'Advanced actions' menu tab of player, search in texts will be continuous, until button not pressed again or the browser's tab won't be closed/reloaded. Otherwise, search will be carried out only 1 time per click

after_finding_the_media_link_1_time_will.message: after finding the media link 1 time will automatically search for the size of its file. You also can press the 'size' button (right blue part of link) in 'Recommended'/'Other links' links section in the Player's menu for this

note_if_websites_have_often_begun_to_blo.message: Note: If websites have often begun to block access to their pages or have begun to suggest to pass a kaptcha, try to uncheck this parameter

non_hover_quick_play_button_opacity.message: Non Hover Quick play button opacity

opacity_of_the_green_buttons_above_the_v.message: opacity of the green buttons above the video elements on the site (buttons for the quick start playing), when the cursor is not over

opacity_of_the_player_s_video_control_pa.message: opacity of the player's video control panel, when the cursor is not over the panel

it_isn_t_recommended_to_set_the_value_eq.message: It isn't recommended to set the value equal to '0'

set_range_parameter_equal_to_0_to_disabl.message: set 'range' parameter equal to '0' to disable shadow

side_spaces_from_edges_of_the_browser_wh.message: side spaces from edges of the browser, when video start to be played

height_of_minimize_and_close_buttons_on_.message: height of 'Minimize' and 'Close' buttons (on the bottom of the player). Set value lower than 20 to hide the buttons

background_color_of_minimize_and_close_b.message: background color of 'Minimize' and 'Close' buttons (on the bottom of the player)

text_color_of_minimize_and_close_buttons.message: text color of 'Minimize' and 'Close' buttons (on the bottom of the player)

background_color_of_play_pause_button_on.message: background color of Play/Pause button (on the bottom left corner of the player)

colors_of_player_s_volume_bar_on_the_bot.message: colors of player's Volume bar (on the bottom left corner of the player)

colors_of_player_s_progress_bar_on_the_b.message: colors of player's Progress bar (on the bottom of the player)

the_parts_on_the_top_of_progress_bar_on_.message: the parts on the top of Progress bar on the bottom of the player

the_brighter_vertical_stripe_on_the_righ.message: the brighter vertical stripe on the right side of Progress bar's front part of the player

recommended_to_set_very_light_color_for_.message: Recommended to set very light color for the best visibility in all cases

level_of_hiding_of_hover_elements.message: Level of hiding of hover elements

if_during_video_playback_you_see_element.message: if during video playback you see elements which block viewing, try to increase this parameter. Helps only in certain cases

pause_the_video_when_player_is_minimized.message: Pause the video, when player is minimized

hide_player_s_control_panel_with_cursor_.message: Hide player's control panel with cursor (Timeout)

_1_sec_1000_msec_period_of_idle_time_of_.message: (1 sec = 1000 msec) period of idle time of the cursor over the player, while playing video, later which the control panel and the cursor will be hidden

distance_which_the_cursor_needs_to_overc.message: distance, which the cursor needs to overcome with the pressed mouse botton, so that appropriate actions are taken

examples_1_swipe_over_the_player_with_pr.message: Examples: 1) Swipe over the player with pressed left mouse button (LMB) from Right to Left will turn on the minimize player mode

_2_swipe_over_the_player_with_pressed_le.message: 2) Swipe over the player with pressed left mouse button (LMB) from Left to Right will close the player

inner_bottom_areas_of_video_s_rewind.message: Inner bottom areas of Video's rewind

these_are_internal_bottom_areas_that_rew.message: These are internal bottom areas, that rewind the video for a minimum amount of time, if you right click on them. Changing the parameters of these areas will change all other sizes of areas like these

Top_sections_make_Force0info0_rewind_for.message: 'Top' sections make Force$info$ rewind for playing video, 'Bottom' sections make Soft$info$ rewind.$br$ Soft rewind - time size of this rewind depends on buffered ranges of playing video, unlike to the Force rewind

Soft_rewind_time_size_of_this_rewind_dep.message: Soft rewind - time size of this rewind depends on buffered ranges of playing video, unlike to the Force rewind

You_can_change_the_volume_of_video_by_mo.message: You can change the volume of video by mouse scrolling, when your cursor is over the player

COLOR_PICKER.message: (options page part) (do not translate this line)

WELCOME.message: (on install addon service page) (do not translate this line)

Thank_you_for_installing_Universal_Custo.message: Thank you for installing Universal Custom Player

We_strongly_recommend_that_you_familiari.message: We strongly recommend that you familiarize yourself with the brief guide
